channel.title: Camps on Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville
channel.description: Recent content in Camps on Robotics - Math - Computer Coding - Chess in Charlottesville

item.title: 1-Day Camp; Apr 18, 2025 | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exhilarating exploration of robotics, coding, chess, and math. Teamwork and collaboration are at the heart of our camp experience. Students will have the opportunity to work together, share ideas, and solve challenges. Through hands-on activities and group projects, students will develop critical thinking skills and learn the importance of effective communication.

item.title: After Camp Care | Blue Ridge Boost
Before Camp Care | Blue Ridge Boost
Drones 2-Day Winter Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Learn to find and modify 3D printing models. Learn to create your own design. Take home your creations. Before and after care is available!

item.title: First Lego League Challenge 2-Day Winter Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join us for an exciting 2-day immersive experience at the First Lego League Challenge Winter Camp! This hands-on camp is designed for young innovators, problem-solvers, and future engineers passionate about robotics, teamwork, and STEM. Participants will dive into the world of LEGO robotics, learn coding skills, and tackle real-world challenges of this year's First Lego League Challenge.

item.title: Minecraft 2-Day Winter Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: ❄️ MINECRAFT WINTER WONDERLAND CAMP ❄️ A Fun-Filled 2-Day Adventure for Young Builders! 🎮 CALLING ALL YOUNG ADVENTURERS Join us for an exciting journey into a snowy Minecraft world! Perfect for both new and experienced players ages 7-10. ⚒️ EXCITING ACTIVITIES: • Build magical snow castles and cozy winter cottages • Create your own winter village with friends • Learn cool building tricks and secrets • Play friendly snowball games

item.title: Roblox 2-Day Winter Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Join our kid-friendly Roblox camp designed specifically for grades 1-4. Create your very own carnival game in a fun, supportive environment where imagination meets basic coding skills. What Your Child Will Learn: Simple drag-and-drop game building Basic Roblox Studio tools Creative design choices Teamwork and problem-solving Game testing basics Fun Activities: Design colorful magic spells Place carnival games and decorations Create simple challenges Test games with classmates Earn special Roblox itemsBefore and after care is available!

item.title: Spring Break Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Sphero robots in the morning and Scratch coding in the afternoon.

item.title: Spring Break Camp | Blue Ridge Boost
item.description: Python coding in the morning and Lego Robotics in the afternoon.
